channel.title: Asking Alexandria
channel.description:
Hey, for those who listen, have listened to Asking Alexandria know how bad live performances Danny worsnop has performed (almost his entire career).
What you think of him now? He became sober and really stepped up in the game. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ii5qhL5HTHQ[/youtube]

item.title: Asking Alexandria
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

haha god how lucky that the taste is like the butt, split.

I like Black Veil Brides I also like Escape The Fate, Falling In Reverse and they are pretty badass.

Now, I have a mixed taste, I love Lamb Of God, but what you call girly is what I do love the most, switching from screaming to singing which makes it the best mixture.

@Kronikz he shaved his hair recently haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Asking Alexandria
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:14, topic:538345”][quote author=Docent link=topic=657171.msg4397480#msg4397480 date=1389566758]
I really don’t like most bands that are formed after 2000+ (except wintersun of course) that have a very long unnecessary name like “Bring me the horizon” or like “Black Veil Brides” or “The Devil Wears Prada” and shit like that. I also hate when a band has a girls name in it… “Chelsea Grin”, “Asking Alexandria”. U gotta think of better names dudes.
[/quote]
Chelsea grin is more than a band if you didn’t know… Look up what it is and what it looks like. That’s where they got their name from.[/quote]
Dennis: Let’s give this cunt a Chelsea Grin!

Darren: Yeah alright, we can use the knife my mother got me for my birthday.

Cunt: Please, no, not the Chelsea Grin, anything but the notorious Chelsea Grin!

Read full topic

I also hate when a band has a girls name in it… “Chelsea Grin”, “Asking Alexandria”. U gotta think of better names dudes.

Chelsea grin is more than a band if you didn’t know… Look up what it is and what it looks like. That’s where they got their name from.

item.title: Asking Alexandria
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:538345”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=657171.msg4396556#msg4396556 date=1389302693]

asking alexandria sucks

emocore is for girls and faggots

AA is not a emocore band though, they’re in the Metalcore/Heavy metal genre

btw, why would emocore be for faggots and girls only? I’m not gay and I like emocore. I think you’ve misunderstood the music taste as a whole.
[/quote]
Stereotypical douches… Just like people putting all music that has screaming/growling in the genre of screamo.[/quote]

Alright, I absolutely love arguing about this topic. Im on Clawz fury’s side. I really hate “metal” with “breakdowns” and my pet peeve is when they scream then they go into weird ass clean vocals all of a sudden like they are trying to get a girl that they have liked since middle school.

Read full topic
